intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website (texts, images, source code, design) is the exclusive property of the publisher, unless explicitly stated otherwise.
intellectualProperty.copyright: Any reproduction, distribution, modification, or use of content without prior authorization is strictly prohibited and may result in legal action.

musicCredits.title: 4. Music Credits - Halloween Page
musicCredits.intro: The music excerpts used on the 'This is Halloween' page are copyrighted works belonging to their respective owners. They are used for educational, entertainment, and cultural promotion purposes:
musicCredits.addamsFamily: The Addams Family - Theme composed by Vic Mizzy
musicCredits.americanHorrorStory: American Horror Story - Theme by Cesar Davila-Irizarry and Charlie Clouser
musicCredits.corpseBride: Corpse Bride - Music by Danny Elfman
musicCredits.scoobyDoo: Scooby-Doo - Theme by David Mook and Ben Raleigh
musicCredits.exorcist: The Exorcist - Tubular Bells by Mike Oldfield
musicCredits.ghostbusters: Ghostbusters - Theme by Ray Parker Jr.
musicCredits.lionKing: The Lion King - 'Be Prepared' by Elton John and Tim Rice
musicCredits.buffy: Buffy the Vampire Slayer - Theme by Nerf Herder
musicCredits.strangerThings: Stranger Things - Theme by Kyle Dixon and Michael Stein
musicCredits.littleMermaid: The Little Mermaid - 'Poor Unfortunate Souls' by Alan Menken and Howard Ashman
musicCredits.walkingDead: The Walking Dead - Theme by Bear McCreary
musicCredits.charmed: Charmed - Theme by Love Spit Love
musicCredits.thisIsHalloween: This is Halloween - The Nightmare Before Christmas, music by Danny Elfman
musicCredits.fairUse: These excerpts are used under fair use for educational and non-commercial purposes. Upon request from copyright holders, the relevant content will be immediately removed.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: This website currently does not collect any personal data. There is no contact form. The only means of communication is through the publicly displayed email address.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: This website currently does not use tracking or analytics cookies. Only technical cookies strictly necessary for the website's operation may be used.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, delete, and port your data. To exercise these rights, contact us by email.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: The publisher strives to keep the website information up-to-date and accurate but cannot guarantee the accuracy, precision, or completeness of the information. The publisher cannot be held responsible for errors, omissions, or results obtained from using this information.

externalLinks.title: 7. External Links
externalLinks.content: This website may contain links to external sites. The publisher has no control over the content of these sites and disclaims all responsibility for their content or practices.

applicableLaw.title: 8. Applicable Law
applicableLaw.content: These legal notices are governed by French law. Any dispute relating to the use of this website will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of French courts.
